title: T206s including Hall of Famers. Listening to offers.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: T206s including Hall of Famers. Listening to offers.
posts.post_content:
Gentlemen,

     I've collected these cards over many years. There are slight variances in size, but most are the same. I have to admit I had concerns on the Chance, but look at the cut from side to side.

     If you would like to make offers, please e-mail me at [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].

    S/h is an additional $7.50 (certified mail). If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family.
[url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url]

Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays,

Brian Van Horn
Bresnahan, Camnitz, Chance, Donlin, Griffith, Huggins and Kelley are still available. Also, I have added a Phillippe with a F F Baker stamp on the back. Listening to offers.
